      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getWatermarkUrl(de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.imagelib.transform.Scale scale, java.util.Optional<PageType> pageType, java.util.Optional<de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.imagelib.ImageType> imageType, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> watermarkId, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> watermarkText)
      Creates the watermark url for the given pageType, adding watermarkId for the current ActiveDocumentBean.getTopDocument() and watermarkText for the current page If the watermark height of the given pageType and image is 0, an empty optional is returned

      • getWatermarkUrl

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getWatermarkUrl(java.util.Optional<PhysicalElement> page,
                                                            java.util.Optional<StructElement> doc,
                                                            java.util.Optional<PageType> pageType)
                                                     throws ViewerConfigurationException,
                                                            IndexUnreachableException,
                                                            DAOException
        Creates the watermark url for the given pageType, adding watermarkId for the given StructElement and page. If the watermark height of the given pageType and image is 0, an empty optional is returned
        Parameters:
        page -
        doc -
        pageType - The pageType of the currentView. Taken into consideration for footer height, if not null
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ViewerConfigurationException
        IndexUnreachableException
        DAOException

      • getWatermarkUrl

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getWatermarkUrl(de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.imagelib.transform.Scale scale,
                                                            java.util.Optional<PageType> pageType,
                                                            java.util.Optional<de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.imagelib.ImageType> imageType,
                                                            java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> watermarkId,
                                                            java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> watermarkText)
                                                     throws IndexUnreachableException,
                                                            DAOException,
                                                            ViewerConfigurationException
        Creates the watermark url for the given pageType, adding watermarkId for the current ActiveDocumentBean.getTopDocument() and watermarkText for the current page If the watermark height of the given pageType and image is 0, an empty optional is returned
        Parameters:
        info - ImageInformation as basis for watermark size. Must not be null
        pageType - The pageType of the currentView. Taken into consideration for footer height, if not null
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        DAOException
        ViewerConfigurationException

        Optionally returns the watermark text for the given page. If the text is empty or none is configures, an empty optional is returned

        Returns:
